Cibando
  • home Home
  • restaurant Ricette
  • add Nuova Ricetta
  • local_post_office Contatti
  • person Accedi
  • personCiao {{user.name}} - PROFILO - ESCI
import { Component, DoCheck } from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/services/auth.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { RecipeService } from 'src/app/services/recipe.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements DoCheck{ user: any; constructor( private router: Router, public authService: AuthService, private recipeService: RecipeService){} ngDoCheck(): void { if(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')) !== null){ this.user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')); } } logout(){ this.authService.logout(); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } sendSearch(ricerca: any){ this.recipeService.search.next(ricerca); this.router.navigate(['ricerca']); } }
